related_questions.question: are they - tired - pretty co c. tired c. sleepy c. marah The correct sentence from the jumble words above is.....

6. Siti : I have a toothache    Lina : You should go to the ....
a. doctor b. dentist c. lawyer
d. hospital​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

b. dentist

Penjelasan:

Karena Siti mengalami sakit gigi, maka Siti harus pergi ke dokter gigi (dentist).

Doctor = dokter

Dentist = dokter gigi

Lawyer = pengacara

Hospital = rumah sakit

Semoga membantu :)
